segments.text: What a mess in this kitchen; I can't believe my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing with water gushing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is just standing there, polishing her plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress are going to get soaked if she doesn't watch out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is spreading, and it's right under her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at those kids, up to no good with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balanced on that shaky stool, reaching in like a thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could collapse and hurt him badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting there, hand out, encouraging the whole thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks so peaceful and neat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast makes the chaos inside even more frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop this before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
